activities: TeleCommunication Systems, Inc. (TCS) may collect a phone number of a mobile subscriber and the subscriber's current location ("Contact Data") for purposes of providing Assisted GPS information to mobile applications hosted by mobile application providers where the mobile subscriber has opted to utilize the mobile application on the subscribers mobile device.  Assisted GPS information is used by the mobile application to quickly locate a GPS satellite in order to obtain a precise location coordinate.
recoursemech: Alternative dispute resolution procedures developed and administered by the American Arbitration Association (AAA).
